ModMetaData.name: Glitter Tech (No Surgery)
ModMetaData.author: Xavior
ModMetaData.description:
Mod ID: 2559817428 (Unoffical Version for 1.3) I am not the original author This mod should work for Rimworld 1.0 to 1.3 GlitterTech adds a ton of shiny new and futuristic items found on the richer developed Glitter worlds. But, this expensive and illegal tech attracts attention of Glitter world Commandos. This is the No Surgery version.
Original Mod: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=725657237 Pulled and updated from: 725657237 mod folder Current Mod Repo: https://github.com/mdrain18/XaviorsGlitterTech_NoSurgery.git
